judges: Before Beul, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
The Court being evenly divided, the order of the lower court is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: Charles E. Marker, with him Scales and Shaw, for appellants.
Avra N. Pershing, Jr., with him Dom A. Me-ffe and Thomas K. Henderson, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Mucha, Appellant, v. Hepler.
Argued October 3, 1967.
Before Beul, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused December 15, 1967.
Charles E. Marker, with him Scales and Shaw, for appellants.
Avra N. Pershing, Jr., with him Dom A. Me-ffe and Thomas K. Henderson, for appellees.
November 14, 1967:
